title: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
created_time: July 07, 2023, 05:30:36 PMLast edit: August 18, 2023, 06:46:22 PM by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
content: 2023 Caribbean Treasures Fully Funded 125,000 Satoshi Copper Bar!The Caribbean Treasures 125k Copper bar is a beautiful way to stack sats. The Price is BTC0.005 each. This price includes funding and shipping within the USA. Purchases from overseas will need additional funding. PM for options.   I have ppff, venmo and cashapp if needed. Material: CopperDenomination: 125,000 SatsShape: Rectangle 1 oz barWeight: 28.3 GYear: 2023Mintage: TBD

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Did I miss the silver skull & crossbones auction/thread? (The silver bar in the middle of the pic ... I like that one)!

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.created_time: July 09, 2023, 03:13:35 AMLast edit: July 09, 2023, 03:45:42 AM by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on July 09, 2023, 02:43:45 AMDid I miss the silver skull & crossbones auction/thread? (The silver bar in the middle of the pic ... I like that one)!  I call them silver stix / skeleton keys. They are 2 oz fine silver. Only 3 made, but they were all different in style. Sold one for 600. Gave one to a friend. I have one left. All were empty open pieces with no specific value tied to it.  Was debating doing a run of 2 oz silver keys.....25-50 pieces. No auction / thread on it that I remember. I make/build a lot of custom/ collab/ alt items that not many people have seen before. CT

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Quote from: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES on July 09, 2023, 03:13:35 AMQuote from: owlcatz on July 09, 2023, 02:43:45 AMDid I miss the silver skull & crossbones auction/thread? (The silver bar in the middle of the pic ... I like that one)!  I call them silver stix / skeleton keys. They are 2 oz fine silver. Only 3 made, but they were all different in style. Sold one for 600. Gave one to a friend. I have one left. All were empty open pieces with no specific value tied to it.  Was debating doing a run of 2 oz silver keys.....25-50 pieces. No auction / thread on it that I remember. I make/build a lot of custom/ collab/ alt items that not many people have seen before. CTWas wondering the same as owlcatz - it looks amazing, love the design of it and the aged look.These along with you other editions sit very well with BitcoinPenny's Spanish treasures release IMO.I think the theme is complimentary to the Caribbean Treasures releases alas the 2oz fine silver would have been outside my budget anyway. Sounds like youhave plenty of design ideas CT.

The antiqued/toned look is amazing.  Quote from: aoluain on July 09, 2023, 07:16:29 AMWas wondering the same as owlcatz - it looks amazing, love the design of it and the aged look.These along with you other editions sit very well with BitcoinPenny's Spanish treasures release IMO.I think the theme is complimentary to the Caribbean Treasures releases Yes, I agree there too, thanks for the close-up shot!

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.created_time: July 10, 2023, 07:02:28 AMLast edit: July 12, 2023, 07:01:44 AM by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Was wondering the same as owlcatz - it looks amazing, love the design of it and the aged look.These along with you other editions sit very well with BitcoinPenny's Spanish treasures release IMO.I think the theme is complimentary to the Caribbean Treasures releases alas the 2oz fine silver would have been outside my budget anyway. Sounds like youhave plenty of design ideas CT.  Yeah BP should have done a Collab with me  He could have made them and I could have built the keys  But lets keep this thread related to the 1 oz copper bar. If more "Silver Keys" are made, i'll list them. They are just a fun side project. From the 1,000's of wallets I have held, Silver Keys are by far the most badass wallet I've seen.
